# SpritesheetSlice.CenterBounds property

Gets the bounds for the center rectangle of this [`SpritesheetSlice`](../SpritesheetSliceType) if it is a 9-patches slice; otherwise, `null`.

```csharp
public Rectangle? CenterBounds { get; }
```
